scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cat window.json > dist/package.json && cp ./html5.png dist && cd src && browserify --transform coffeeify --extension=coffee chip8.coffee > ../dist/chip8.js && jade index.jade --pretty --out ../dist
scripts.zip: cp zip.exe dist && cd dist && zip.exe ../chip8.nw chip8.js html5.png index.html package.json && rm zip.exe && cd ..
scripts.make: npm run zip && mkdir -p bin && cat ./node_modules/nw/nwjs/nw chip8.nw > ./bin/chip8 && chmod +x ./bin/chip8 && rm -f chip8.nw
scripts.make:windows: npm run zip && mkdir bin && cp ./node_modules/nw/nwjs/icudtl.dat ./node_modules/nw/nwjs/nw.pak bin && cat ./node_modules/nw/nwjs/nw.exe chip8.nw > ./bin/chip8.exe && rm -f chip8.nw
